thread.title: Kristina Ibragimova
thread.title_full: Cambridge Proofreading reviewed by Kristina Ibragimova

author: Kristina Ibragimova
title: Kristina Ibragimova
text:
I have had problems with other companies before.At the moment I am very happy that I found exactly Cambridge Proofreading LLC, as the work which I received was pretty clear and easy to follow! The quality, from my point of view, is also great.
In case I need it again I will definitely come back as well as recommend it to guys who are starting their dissertations now.
Also wanted to mention that I am not paying attention while doing something. The thing is I supposed to send only 10000 words, but IÂ´ve send 14000 and paid for 14000, when I texted to the company they 've refund the difference without any problems. I mean, besides amazing quality of writing services, company is very flexible and kind to customers. What is also very big advantage)))
